title: "Feature: Real-Time Notification System"

---

## Description
Implement a notification system to keep students informed about event updates, club announcements, and registrations.

## New Features
- Real-time event notifications
- Club announcement alerts
- Registration confirmation notifications
- User notification preferences/settings
- Email digest option for notifications

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Notifications are sent when events are created
- [ ] Users receive alerts for relevant club updates
- [ ] Users can manage notification preferences
- [ ] Notification history is viewable
- [ ] Notifications work on web and mobile
